content: Leave blank to use default header

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a subtitle that explains the usage of an authentication header when leaving it blank. It is used in a UI element where users can configure document service settings, and appears as a tooltip or label for clarity. The text prompts users to leave the header blank if they wish to use the default header setting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Standart başlığı istifadə etmək üçün boş buraxın.' while understandable, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'Leave blank to use default header'. A more accurate rendering might focus on the 'default' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Başlanğıc başlığını istifadə etmək üçün boş qoyun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Jätä tyhjäksi käyttääksesi oletusotsikkoa' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Jätä tyhjäksi käyttääksesi oletusarvoista otsikkoa' or 'Anna tyhjäksi käyttääksesi oletusotsikkoa'.

The translation "Թողեք դատարկ՝ լռելյայն վերնագիրը օգտագործելու համար" is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning as naturally in Armenian. The phrase 'լռելյայն վերնագիրը' sounds overly formal and technical for a settings context. It's better to use a more common and easily understandable phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Թողեք դատարկ՝ դեֆոլտ վերնագիրը օգտագործելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of a hyphen (-) is unusual in this context. A dash (–) or no connector at all would flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Թողեք դատարկ դեֆոլտ վերնագիրը օգտագործելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lăsați spațiu necompletat pentru a folosi antetul implicit' is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Romanian. 'Leave blank' is best translated as 'Lăsați câmpul gol' or 'Lăsați câmpul liber'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lăsați câmpul gol pentru a folosi antetul implicit

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. 'ශීර්ෂකය හිස්වල් තැබීම පෙරනිතිගත ශීර්ෂකය භාවිතා කිරීමට ඉඩ දීම' is a very wordy and awkward phrasing. It translates to 'Leaving the header empty allows using the default header'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like: 'ශීර්ෂකය සුදු හිස්සෙන් තැබුවහ පෙරනිතිගත ශීර්ෂකය භාවිත වේ.' or 'ශීර්ෂකය සුදු හිස්සෙන් තැබුවහ පෙරනිති ආකාරයෙන් පෙනේ.' (This translates to 'If the header is left blank, the default header is used.')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'ඉඩ දීම' is slightly formal and can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ඉඩ දීම' with a simpler word or phrase depending on the specific nuance desired.
